import logo from './logo.svg'; import './App.css'; import { useState } from 'react'; function App() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // API 호출 또는 폼 처리 로직 console.log('Form submitted:', formData); }; const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; return (
